org.guicebox
Class CommandLineModule

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      org.guicebox.PropertiesModule
          org.guicebox.CommandLineModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.inject.Module
public class CommandLineModule
extends PropertiesModule

An extension of PropertiesModule that allows binding of constants from the command line via command-line switches, overriding values bound via properties files. (See PropertiesModule for more information.)

A command-line switch is supplied in the format -key value. If no value is supplied, the key is bound to true.

Author:
willhains
